document_data.name: Melodia Thorm
document_data.mainbody: '''Melodia Thorm''' was a [[half-elf]] of [[House Thorm]], a follower of [[Selûne]], and the wife of General [[Ketheric Thorm]], as well as the mother of [[Isobel Thorm]].
